0C3AEB87.Line13.BD31C: My son was wiser than even the Horadrim, but it was not in his nature to be a shepherd either.

4023DE8B.Line17.BD31C: Inarius. Elias. Lorath. They wanted so badly to see their own meaning in the Prophecy, they were blind to the simple truth of it.

5E8846E6.Line21.BD31C: It will always be a part of us. We must fight to survive.

A62F6509.Line15.BD31C: His Prophecy was a warning, but rather than use it to unite Sanctuary, he let it breed chaos.

DA18580D.Line19.BD31C: We are prisoners of the Eternal Conflict. The pawns of angels and demons.
